name: House Of Special People
description:
"House Of Special People" is a small puzzle platformer made for the Ludum Dare 35 Jam competition. The theme of the competition was "Shapeshift".

You play the character "Ed", a little boy, that is trapped in a big creepy mansion. Help him to get out of there by transforming into different animals with super powers and by solving puzzles.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: Move Ed
  • E: Open Doors (Only 2 Doors Are Working!)
  • Z: Transform Into Human
  • X, C, V: Transform Into Animal
  • ESC: Quit Game

Objections

  • Enjoy Ed's derp face
  • Find the hidden message (just a placeholder, sorry - we had not enough time)
